title: Is Disney/Pixar’s ‘Monsters, Inc.’ Sequel Set for a July 2020 Release?
subtitle: A fan-made poster quickly crossed from Instagram to Facebook and led fans to believe Pixar was releasing the 'Monsters, Inc.' sequel 'Boo' in 2020.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Disney/Pixar announced the upcoming release of 'Boo' (a sequel to 'Monsters, Inc.') in July 2020.
